title: As sea level rises, wetlands crank up their carbon storage

title_detail.value: As sea level rises, wetlands crank up their carbon storage

summary: Some wetlands perform better under pressure. A new study revealed that when faced with sea-level rise, coastal wetlands respond by burying even more carbon in their soils.

summary_detail.value: Some wetlands perform better under pressure. A new study revealed that when faced with sea-level rise, coastal wetlands respond by burying even more carbon in their soils.
